setChannelAdress(String) - Method in class fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.model.TVChannel
Set the channel address
setChannelName(String) - Method in class fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.model.TVChannel

setNbStreamRunning(int) - Static method in class fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.controler.MainControler
Setter for the number of streams running
StreamControler - Class in fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.controler
StreamControler is the class that handle with the stream to run StreamControler starts a stream by calling a StreamView class and running the streamlink command
StreamControler(TVChannel) - Constructor for class fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.controler.StreamControler
Constructor of the StreamControler.
StreamControler.PlayMediaObserver - Class in fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.controler
Observer class that calls its update method in two cases: When the log displays "Stream ended" and there is no stream left to run, the program will terminate.
streamview - Variable in class fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.controler.StreamControler
Viewer of the stream.
StreamView - Class in fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.view
The StreamView class is made to display the stream to the screen.
StreamView(String) - Constructor for class fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.view.StreamView
Constructor of the StreamView object.
